mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cate (name, des, userId) VALUES (#{name}, #{des}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, des, updateTime, userId from cate WHERE userId = #{userId} order by updateTime desc
SELECT id, name, des, updateTime, userId from cate WHERE name = #{name} and userId = #{userId}
SELECT id, name, des, updateTime, userId from cate WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id,name, des, updateTime, userId from cate WHERE id in (select cateId from cate_file where fileId = #{id} ) order by updateTime desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file JOIN cate_file ON file.id = cate_file.fileId WHERE cate_file.cateId=#{cateId} AND file.status = 1
